document_data.name: City Guard of Talab
document_data.mainbody: The '''City Guard''' of [[Talab]] served as a police force within the city as well as a standing army for the "City of Questing".
document_data.Organization: The composition of the city guard as of {{Yearlink|1367}}{{AQ-time}} was 1,000 regular city guards, 100 [[cleric]]s, and 900 [[mamluk]]s of the [[Parched Mamluk Society]]. An additional 3,000 soldiers and 2,000 cavalry from the [[Sword of the True Gods]] were also stationed in Talab.
document_data.Activities: The sole task of the mamluks was to protect Talab's water supply. The Pantheist cavalry guarded the route into the [[Cities of the Ancients]] region.
